entry.title: Appearance and Structure Diagrams
entry.content:
Abstract: The first generation of the new type of electrochemical pen microbox with the use of replaceable display device, including the display device of the light and magnetic display, and the interdisciplinary display; The delicate electrolytic bottle is prepared by the proper concentration of various typical electrolytes. The independent development of solid electrolytic tube has achieved the goal of testing the electric conductivity after low temperature solid melting. The complete set of equipment is rich and perfect, small and small, so that the experiment can be miniaturized to win more time and space for teachers.

First, Product construction

1.Full appearance of optical and magnetic - liquid electrolytic bottles

1.1 Optical display device


1.2 Magnetic display device


2.The pen body


3.Liquid electrolytic bottle

4.Full appearance of optical and magnetic - solid electrolytic tube

4.1Solid electrolytic tube



Second,Schematic Diagram
entry.summary: Abstract: The first generation of the new type of electrochemical pen microbox with the use of replaceable display device, including the display device of the light and magnetic display, and the interdisciplinary display; The delicate electrolytic bottle is prepared by the proper concentration of various typical electrolytes. The independent development of solid electrolytic tube has achieved the goal of testing the electric conductivity after low temperature solid melting. The complete set of equipment is rich and perfect, small and small, so that the experiment can be miniaturized to win more time and space for teachers.
